channel.title: Your first post of 2009
channel.description:
Post your first post of 2009.
Mine is from January 10th.
on: January 10, 2009, 01:56:15 pm To be honest, this is quite funny. I've seen EVERY feature in your client and source somewhere else. You haven't made ONE thing by yourself. By the way, I've even seen the santa hat crowns other places as well. I've been with Mopar since early 2006 so I know how to tell when someone is full of bullshit. What else is funny is when somebody points out that you leached something and they give you the name of the maker you simply say. "Who's/what's (Name)." You've done it multiple times in this post.
You say you're going to be the first to have a 508 with custom items? HA! You have no idea what a custom item is do you? All you have in this source is recolored items which is NOT a custom item. All your items are is pieces of a model ripped off and put on your character, or simply a sword that has new colors in it. That is 100% fail my friend. If you want to have custom items, why don't you make your OWN model, convert it into RS2 Client format.DAT and add it to there.
You have some serious issues trying to pull this off and your own work. And what's funny is you described "coding" as moving objects around changing npcs ect. WRONG! I bet you haven't attempted to touch the combat systems, Ranged, Melee, Magic. Did you even try to mess with NPC/PLAYER Facing? Did you even try to add a simple grand exchange. No you simply moved shit around, you spawned some random objects leached from another source and you called it your own "custom" way of coding.
Way to go. The only reason people are posting "good job," is because they don't know what they are talking about. They are new to servers most likely. Anyone with a decent sense of Java education will tear you apart and point out your bullshit and your flaws.
So...
Go get your daddy's gun and well... use it on yourself because you have already proven to me and the rest of the community that you're a pathetic excuse for a human being and you really don't deserve to live at this point.
So quit making servers until you know what you're doing. Then maybe you will post something worthwhile.
Kthnxbi
-Aeolian
ReplyReply Reply with quoteQuote Notify of repliesNotify
Hopefully some of yours aren't as troll-ish as mine.
If you don't know how. Go to your profile, click [b][i]last posts of this member.[/i][/b] Then find the first post that you posted this year!

@jc22493 wrote:

Haha, my first post of 2009.

[quote=“Jc22493, post:1, topic:254457”]I get this error when I run my server.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:111)

I only changed things in my Item.Cfg, and they were correctly changed. Thanks in advance for any help!

~Jc22493[/quote]

and also in the clients client.java for it you should find just change it in there and compile and run.
it should say what you changed it to

item.title: Your first post of 2009
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

1593

Runescape 2 Server Emulation / Server Help / My first step.
on: March 29, 2009, 11:19:10 am

I haven’t messed with servers in well over a year, and I’ve been thinking about getting back into them. Looking through all the server downloads, I realized people try too hard. What I would like is if someone knew a basic server download, they gave me a link. I mean something that’s got nothing added, but easily editable. Back then, we used PKScape. Stripped of most, and little added. Does anyone know a server like that? Thanks.

ReplyReply Reply with quoteQuote Notify of repliesNotify

The one under this is October 2nd '07 =S

Read full topic

item.title: Your first post of 2009

item.description:

Post your first post of 2009.

Mine is from January 10th.

on: January 10, 2009, 01:56:15 pm
To be honest, this is quite funny. I’ve seen EVERY feature in your client and source somewhere else. You haven’t made ONE thing by yourself. All your items are is pieces of a model ripped off and put on your character, or simply a sword that has new colors in it. That is 100% fail my friend. You have some serious issues trying to pull this off and your own work. And what’s funny is you described “coding” as moving objects around changing npcs ect. WRONG! I bet you haven’t attempted to touch the combat systems, Ranged, Melee, Magic. Did you even try to mess with NPC/PLAYER Facing? Did you even try to add a simple grand exchange. No you simply moved shit around, you spawned some random objects leached from another source and you called it your own “custom” way of coding.

Way to go. The only reason people are posting “good job,” is because they don’t know what they are talking about. They are new to servers most likely. Anyone with a decent sense of Java education will tear you apart and point out your bullshit and your flaws.

So…

Go get your daddy’s gun and well… use it on yourself because you have already proven to me and the rest of the community that you’re a pathetic excuse for a human being and you really don’t deserve to live at this point.

So quit making servers until you know what you’re doing. Then maybe you will post something worthwhile.
